summary: Ever thought who'd win in a fight between your Skyrim character and your Morrowind character? Well now you can! Just travel to Old Hroldan and attack him when you're ready to commence battling! However you will need to the Ordinator armor mod courtesy of Natterforme and his contributors.
descriptionHtml:
So this is my 2nd mod and is based off the Nerevarine (my version of it) from the Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind. He is wearing Ordinator armor and wields keening (for a nostalgic effect). He is super buffed so he should be a tough fight unless you're really overpowered and spam attack. Seeing as it's still a WIP (I intend to expand it even more) If you are interested in improving the mod, such as quest making, or weapon creating PM me! The ordinator armor link is down below.
Edit: Nerevarine now wields Trueflame (possibly will add hopesfire soon as well as custom spells)

Credits:
Thanks to Natterforme for the Ordinator armor mod for skyrim
Thanks to Cyro for creating the Oblivion version of this armor.
Thanks to themythofanst for supporting and housing the armor in the Vvardenfell Imports mod in Oblivion.
Thanks to sockit2me66 for his initial contributions to porting this armor and allowing me to take over the project.
Thank you to CaBal120 for providing updated, high resolution textures to bring this armor into the future of TES games and allowing new and old players alike to enjoy this armor for many years to come(once implimented).
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and Oblivion.
Thanks to SkyrimNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on
Thanks to ArdenDanmer and his other contributors for their work on the Truflame mod

Ordinator armor: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26720/?
Trueflame: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/47249/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D47249%26preview%3D&pUp=1
author: jbum26

files.name: NerevarinebattleV2
files.changelogHtml: Added the Trueflame to the Nerevarine's arsenal by popular demand. The mod is courtesy of Ardendanmer and his contributors. Check out the description page for the link, IT IS NECESSARY TO DOWNLOAD IN ORDER FOR VERSION 2.0 TO WORK
